特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This class is conducted on campus.  Students will work in pairs and small groups to explore and discuss a range of socio-political issues.  In addition to extended discussions, students will work in pairs and small groups to complete shorter, unit topic-related interactive tasks.
